resources: • ONLINECrúbadán language data for Dogrib. Kevin Scannell. 2015. The Crúbadán Project. oai:crubadan.org:dgr
• Tłįįchǫ yati enįhtł'è (Dogrib dictionary). Feenstra, Jacob (compiler). 1992. Dogrib Divisional Board of Education. oai:sil.org:15849
• Tłįchǫ yatiì enįhtł'è (A Dogrib dictionary). Saxon, Leslie (editor); Siemens, Mary (editor). 1996. Dogrib Divisional Board of Education. oai:sil.org:40885
• ONLINEDictionary turns the tide. Kindberg, Eric W. 2007. SIL Forum for Language Fieldwork 2007-006. oai:sil.org:7785
• Athapaskan classificatory verbs. Davidson, William; Elford, L. W.; Hoijer, Harry. 1963. University of California Publications in Linguistics. oai:sil.org:2309
• A preliminary analysis of active verbs in Dogrib. Davidson, William. 1963. University of California Publications in Linguistics. oai:sil.org:2512
• ONLINEDogrib: a language of Canada. n.a. 2013. SIL International. oai:ethnologue.com:dgr

• ONLINELINGUIST List Resources for Dogrib. Damir Cavar, Director of Linguist List (editor); Malgorzata E. Cavar, Director of Linguist List (editor). 2015-11-06. The LINGUIST List (www.linguistlist.org). oai:linguistlist.org:lang_dgr
• ONLINEGlottolog 2.6 Resources for Dogrib. n.a. 2015. Max Planck Institute for the Science of Human History. oai:glottolog.org:dogr1252
